data.title: Welcome to Dr Z Naturally
data.text:
Radio programming, ongoing:

Natural Alternatives Health Radio on WUSB, 90.1 FM Fridays 6-7PM

WUSB is Long Island’s largest non-commercial radio station

The Natural House Call on WPKN 89.5 FM Alternating Sundays 8-9AM

WPKN, Bridgeport is CT’s largest listener supported community radio station

Herbally Yours on WHPC 90.3 FM, Tuesdays 6:30 – 7 PM

Nassau County’s largest community radio station

Radio Appearances on:

WALE Rhode Island

WCBS, News Radio 880, NYC

WBAI, 99.5 FM, NYC Natural Living with Gary Null, Ph.D.

Magazine/News articles & quotes

The Natural Medicine Chest is a syndicated column in:

Healthy & Natural Journal {Nationally known magazine, circulation, 300,000}

Creations Magazine {Throughout Long Island}

Conscious Living Magazine {Fairfield, Litchfield, New Haven Counties, CT}
